name: Sea Rescue (aterlamia)
description:
Created for dragon jam.

After decades of polluting and fishing our seas are empty and death. But when we finally make it to space an opportunity arises . Other races and other planets and some fish out there could save our oceans. 

You find that we are not alone and join a intergalactic trading treaty.  You will have to travel, trade and manage your ship crew and assets to find the things you need.

Read the news to see where you have chance  to find fish. Check where you should go or better not go.

Check your ship to see if you have enough fuel and better pay your crew.

Buy, sell buy sell buy sell until you have enough spacebux to buy those fish.

Disclaimer:

As it is made for a gamejam it is not finished and i wanted to do much more. As it stands the game should be finish able if you manage your ship correctly.
